panels.annotation: Full page splash - Eskil's berserker rage
panels.visual: Eskil emerges from his tent roaring something in the tongue of the north, war-blade already in motion. His skin has flushed bright red, muscles bulging impossibly. Runes carved and painted across his massive frame seem to glow. The stroke that follows is a butchering - cleaving a bandit in two with terrible, practiced efficiency. Remaining bandits flee into the darkness, their courage broken by this single, terrible display. Behind him, the iron skull at his belt glows with faint witch-fire.
panels.narration: And then Eskil emerged from his tent. The remaining bandits fled into the darkness, their courage broken by that single, terrible display.
